DOC.brief_summary: The objective of this study was to assess the feasibility and effectiveness of using a statewide immunization information system (IIS) to send seasonal influenza vaccine reminders from Local Health Departments (LHDs), targeting children with high-risk conditions.
DOC.brief_title: Seasonal Influenza Vaccination Reminders for Children With High-risk Conditions
DOC.criteria: children, 2460 months current or previous enrollment in Medicaid (Michigan) presence of at least 1 chronic condition, as indicated by the Michigan Care Improvement Registry (MCIR) resident of Kalamazoo, Ottawa, or Kent counties (Michigan) receipt of influenza prior to notification date ineligible for reminder/recall notification in the Michigan Care Improvement Registry (MCIR)
